form.text: (in thousands except for per share data)
Fourth quarter results of 2003 include favorable adjustments to revenue and expenses totaling $2.5 million, related
to true-ups of management’s estimates and settlements of disputes with Sprint and a $0.4
change in vacation benefit accrual for employees.
Second quarter results of 2002 include the loss of $4.9 million, net of tax effects on the other than temporary write-
Per share earnings may not add to the full year values as each per share calculation stands on its own.
